Name: Bud Blitz
About the game: 'Grow your way to the top to become the king/queen of the crop!' Bud Blitz is a fast-paced cannabis-themed action/arcade game with a splash of simulation. Grow your way to the top of the leaderboard while defending your crops from enemies by using a variety of outrageous weapons! Maintain optimal light and water levels to prevent stressing your plants and be sure to keep your mind on your money because if you run out, your growing days will go up in smoke! Features: - 6 strains of cannabis to grow - 3 upgradable weapons to protect your crops - 8 power-ups to aid your growing experience - 35 Steam Achievements to unlock - Procedurally-generated plant variations - Global High Score Leaderboard Controller Note: To play with a Steam/Xbox/PS controller, select the Bud Blitz Official Steam Controller Binding found under Steam Input -> Controller Configuration -> Recommended
